ResourceHeader.ResourceName: STEREO/EUVI Event Catalog (>C1 GOES class or >12 keV RHESSI)
ResourceHeader.Description:
This is a descriptive catalogue of flare and CME events observed with EUVI (2006 -2009). 
It includes a summary of observations on EUVI, Cor1 and Cor2, GOES, RHESSI and SOHO/LASCO.
EUVI Classification: 
A=Ahead only without Behind data B=Behind only without Ahead data 
I=Impulsive time profile (peak in coincidence with SXR)
P=Postflare loop or arcade (delayed emission after SXR peak) 
D=Dimming (EUV flux decreases after SXR peak)
E=Eruptive filament
O=Occulted for A (if flare position is east) or B (if west)
T=Test images (or poor image quality)
W=Waves and oscillations
CME reported:       L=LASCO/SOHO, S=SECCHI/Cor-1,Cor-2

AccessURL.Name: Early EUVI Event Catalog 2006-2009 [285 events] at LMSAL
